Hailing from another world, the Messiah continues their duty to restore light to the realm. Despite being a child, the Messiah offers bottomless utility with their many supportative skills. There is no time for hesitation, they have only One Shot!

The Messiah wears a brown overcoat and scarf alongside a hat with catlike ears. While this garb doesn't provide much protection, the Messiah utilizes divine guidance during expeditions to avoid danger. The lightbulb they carry is a powerful artifact, capable of illuminating entire worlds, which the Messiah wields to support their allies and ward off evil.

During camp, the Messiah uses methods they learned during their first venture into another world, providing guidance for their companions, as well as happily sharing their favorite dish. The lightbulb they carry illuminates the campsite, discouraging all evil from approaching the resting heroes.

Hailing from another world, the Messiah continues their duty to restore light to the realm. Despite being a child, the Messiah offers bottomless utility with their many supportative skills. There is no time for hesitation, they have only One Shot!

The Messiah wears a brown overcoat and scarf alongside a hat with catlike ears. While this garb doesn't provide much protection, the Messiah utilizes divine guidance during expeditions to avoid danger. The lightbulb they carry is a powerful artifact, capable of illuminating entire worlds, which the Messiah wields to support their allies and ward off evil.

During camp, the Messiah uses methods they learned during their first venture into another world, providing guidance for their companions, as well as happily sharing their favorite dish. The lightbulb they carry illuminates the campsite, discouraging all evil from approaching the resting heroes.

Hailing from another world, the Messiah continues their duty to restore light to the realm. Despite being a child, the Messiah offers bottomless utility with their many supportative skills. There is no time for hesitation, they have only One Shot!

The Messiah wears a brown overcoat and scarf alongside a hat with catlike ears. While this garb doesn't provide much protection, the Messiah utilizes divine guidance during expeditions to avoid danger. The lightbulb they carry is a powerful artifact, capable of illuminating entire worlds, which the Messiah wields to support their allies and ward off evil.

During camp, the Messiah uses methods they learned during their first venture into another world, providing guidance for their companions, as well as happily sharing their favorite dish. The lightbulb they carry illuminates the campsite, discouraging all evil from approaching the resting heroes.

Hailing from another world, the Messiah continues their duty to restore light to the realm. Despite being a child, the Messiah offers bottomless utility with their many supportative skills. There is no time for hesitation, they have only One Shot!

The Messiah wears a brown overcoat and scarf alongside a hat with catlike ears. While this garb doesn't provide much protection, the Messiah utilizes divine guidance during expeditions to avoid danger. The lightbulb they carry is a powerful artifact, capable of illuminating entire worlds, which the Messiah wields to support their allies and ward off evil.

During camp, the Messiah uses methods they learned during their first venture into another world, providing guidance for their companions, as well as happily sharing their favorite dish. The lightbulb they carry illuminates the campsite, discouraging all evil from approaching the resting heroes.

Hailing from another world, the Messiah continues their duty to restore light to the realm. Despite being a child, the Messiah offers bottomless utility with their many supportative skills. There is no time for hesitation, they have only One Shot!

The Messiah wears a brown overcoat and scarf alongside a hat with catlike ears. While this garb doesn't provide much protection, the Messiah utilizes divine guidance during expeditions to avoid danger. The lightbulb they carry is a powerful artifact, capable of illuminating entire worlds, which the Messiah wields to support their allies and ward off evil.

During camp, the Messiah uses methods they learned during their first venture into another world, providing guidance for their companions, as well as happily sharing their favorite dish. The lightbulb they carry illuminates the campsite, discouraging all evil from approaching the resting heroes.
